name: Halloween (itch) (mcteamster)
description:
A side-on survival shooter inspired by Flash games of the 2000s, this game brings new meaning to the phrase "Death By PowerPoint".

Use the mouse or touch to fend off wave after wave of infected - can you make it 'till sunrise?

Choose between three weapons! Your trusty Handgun, the classic Shotgun, or a special-ops Assault Rifle.

Programmed and drawn entirely without the use of macros, Halloween pushes the limits of what can be done with humble Microsoft Office.
